dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: Ah you seem confused! Well I suppose that is to be expected. You see my name is Eric, but everybody calls me Prince, due to my royal ancestry of a humble, but beautiful western country.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: A small western country? A prince? Come on this is all getting a bit ridiculous isn’t it?

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: In my country we hold the esteemed values of old in the highest regard. That is why we still keep Knights around...though admittedly it is more or less a title and nothing more.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: He started to go on some tirade about how great his country is...

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: My point is you have all the makings of becoming a knight! What do you say will you become a knight in my servitude?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: This guy does realise what he is asking right?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: You do realise that we barely know each other right? And yet you are asking me to become a knight in your service?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Most normal people would question him wouldn’t they?

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: Well that is fine. I am sure after listening to some stories of great valour you will agree to become a knight in my service!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I am about to say no and then my tattoo comes into my view. Maybe I am becoming more and more of a defeatist, but I just know that even if I say I won’t I’m just going to get dragged along anyway....

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: He gave me his phone number and I went home.
